description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/1345350573 at Mon Jun 14 15:45:35 UTC 2021

panels.title: Five Minute Production App's Error Budgets (past 28d)

targets.expr:
# Account for missing metrics that are turned into 0 by `vector(0)`.
clamp_max(
  # Number of successful measurements
  sum by ()(
    # Reuest with satisfactory apdex
    sum_over_time(
      gitlab:component:stage_group:execution:apdex:success:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",stage_group="5-min-app"}[28d]
    ) or vector(0)
    +
    # Requests without error
    (
      sum_over_time(
        gitlab:component:stage_group:execution:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",stage_group="5-min-app"}[28d]
      )
      -
      sum_over_time(
        gitlab:component:stage_group:execution:error:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",stage_group="5-min-app"}[28d]
      ) or vector(0)
    )
  )
  /
  # Number of measurements
  sum by ()(
    # Apdex Measurements
    sum_over_time(
      gitlab:component:stage_group:execution:apdex:weight:score_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",stage_group="5-min-app"}[28d]
    ) or vector(0)
    +
    # Requests
    sum_over_time(
      gitlab:component:stage_group:execution:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",stage_group="5-min-app"}[28d]
    )
  ),
1)

# The number of seconds allowed to be spent in 28d
1209
-
(
  (
     1 - # Account for missing metrics that are turned into 0 by `vector(0)`.
clamp_max(

    (
      sum_over_time(
        gitlab:component:stage_group:execution:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",stage_group="5-min-app"}[28d]
      )
      -
      sum_over_time(
        gitlab:component:stage_group:execution:error:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",stage_group="5-min-app"}[28d]
      ) or vector(0)

  )
  /
  # Number of measurements

    sum_over_time(
      gitlab:component:stage_group:execution:apdex:weight:score_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",stage_group="5-min-app"}[28d]

      gitlab:component:stage_group:execution:ops:rate_1h{environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",stage_group="5-min-app"}[28d]

1)

)

options.content:
### [Error budget](https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/engineering/error-budgets/)

These error budget panels show an aggregate of SLIs across all components.
However, not all components have been implemented yet.

The [handbook](https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/engineering/error-budgets/)
explains how these budgets are used.

Read more about how the error budgets are calculated in the
[stage group dashboard documentation](https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/development/stage_group_dashboards.html#error-budget).

The error budget is compared to our SLO of 99.95% and is always in
a range of 28 days from the selected end date in Grafana.

### Availability

The availability shows the percentage of operations labeled with one of the
categories owned by deploy with satisfactory completion.

### Budget remaining

The error budget in minutes is calculated based on the 99.95%.
There are 40320 minutes in 28 days, we allow 0.05% of failures, which
means the budget in minutes is 20 minutes.

The budget remaining shows how many minutes have not been spent in the
past 28 days.

### Minutes spent

This shows the total minutes spent over the past 28 days.

For example, if there were 403200 (28 * 24 * 60) operations in 28 days.
This would be 1 every minute. If 10 of those were unsatisfactory, that
would mean 10 minutes of the budget were spent.

Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è and [Grafonnet](https://github.com/grafana/grafonnet-lib). [Contribute to this dashboard on GitLab.com](https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/blob/master/dashboards/./product/deploy_error_budget.dashboard.jsonnet)

title: product: Error Budgets - deploy
